body: God this is fantastic, the art is fantastic, the story is fantastic, its super hot, everything is perfect 10/10

love that he has a solution even for the last problem
there are similar stories where the brother just left her get wet on stage
honest smart girls that let it happen -> :D

Looks like some people come equipped with auto-correct. I didn't realize that until I read the comic a second time and payed close attention to the writing and it didn't make any sense. The first time I didn't have trouble understanding the text.

@AgentTed The last part of your comment is goddamn wrong. Adapting a raw to another language is the main point of translations in order to make them understandable, you idiot. And of course it won't make sense if you translate a raw word by word since every languague have different sematics. You must adapt the raw to the language in question (a big plus if you keep it faithful to the original script) or otherwise you'll do a shit translation.
I agree with jackyHF, Quit bitching you bunch of asshats.
If you people want better translations, you can always pay someone professional instead of bitching about amateur work that you get for free.
huh i guess my mind auto corrects words for me, cause i understood everything i had to ho read a second time to notice the errors

He's right though about amateur translations, I get so sick of how anyone who is a manga or anime freak thinks they can do it.  Learn the damn language the right way and learn that if you translate a raw, word for word, it will make no sense at all in english.  You are basically changing one culture to another, meaning different meanings and sentence structures.
Dialogue doesn't bug me that much I mainly care about the images
Read the raws instead of shitty amateur attempts at translation before making sweeping generalisations about loli manga, champion.
This is the reason I hate loli hentai, the dialogue is annoying and makes absolutely no sense
good onii-chan, helping his imouto with extra care.
